name: Hollandaise Sauce
steps: Whisk yolks in a mixing bowl with lemon juice, mustard and water.
Place bowl over double boiler with a towel and whisk to ribbon stage-keep moving esp. edges. Looks thick-coats the back of a spoon.
Slowly begin to add melted butter to the yolk mixture to create the emulsion-whisk constantly.
Adjust the seasoning with Tabasco and salt. Strain.
1 inch of water on bottom of pan-medium, put towel on top, then place on the top of the bowl.
Pour sauce over asparagus and then grate lemon peel over it.
